title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, it reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports a failure to create the JAR due to unsaved editors.
EB: I expect to be able to save the unsaved editors without quitting the wizard. If I cannot save them, there should be a dialog prompting me to save them.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file and make some edits without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project containing the unsaved file.
3. Enter all the required fields such as path, destination, name of the JAR packager, description, etc.
4. Press the 'Finish' button.
